name: The Unreal Journey of Mongol
summary: The game is Cartoon low-poly scenes. Each scene has its own characteristics, including different match colors and various object models.Six vivid scenes respectively corresponded to six different gameplay. There are actions, decryption and puzzles, to pass the level. Green prairie, Purple forest, Blue island, Blue island, Yellow desert, Black ruins, White glacier. I hope you like the game, thank you.
